title: See Midsummer Night's Stars Again
overview: The story follows our heroine, Lin Xiao Xia who poses as a jewellery con artist to trick people into buying fake expensive jewelries. She meets our hero â€“ a spoiled rich young master of a jewellery company who ran away after stealing a precious necklace from his family. They become friends and he also happens to be the only person who believes her when she's telling the truth and encourages her to step out of her past mistakes and pursue a career as a jewellery designer. She, in turn, helps him see the value of jewelries and his family's hard work.
